title: Cote d'or, Pouilly-en-Aurois (A Country Landscape)
medium: black chalk, heightened with white on grey paper
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Eugène Cicéri [1813-1890], Marlotte, France. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975.

Notes:
[1]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
